alert.note: Alert for Southern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 4:59PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Herkimer County through 545 PM EDT... At 458 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Frankfort, or near Ilion, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, pea size hail, and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Heavy rains could cause ponding on roadways. Locations impacted include... Ilion, Frankfort, West Winfield, Cedarville, Elizabethtown, Birmingham Corners, Jersalem Hill, West Frankfort, Spinnerville, Cedarville Station, Corrado Corners, Cedar Lake, Harbor, Gulph, East Winfield, Parker Corners, Cranes Corners, South Ilion, Chepachet and Norwich Corners. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
